## General Guidance
Please find below some general guidance on the VBDs and how to reach out to us

### Feedback, Contact, VBD IP and FAQ
- To submit Feedback on the VBDs, please submit them at [VBDFeedback](https://aka.ms/CSUDAI/Feedback)
- For any questions on the content execution guide, please email us at [TechstrategyTeamDAI](mailto:techstrategyteamdai@microsoft.com)
- To view some FAQs on VBDs, please check this link on [VBD FAQ](https://aka.ms/VBDFAQDataAI)
- For any new IP that is created as a part of VBD delivery, please submit a feedback item at [VBDFeedback](https://aka.ms/CSUDAI/Feedback) and reach out to [TechstrategyTeamDAI](mailto:techstrategyteamdai@microsoft.com)

### Accreditation, Funding Guidance
- For *Accreditation*, please click on the learning path under VBD learning paths in the Customer Scenario page and you will find the link to get accredited in the learning path pages. You may also access the learning paths [here](https://aka.ms/VBDReadinessDataAI). 

- For *Funding Guidance* on VBDs, please refer to the [VBD Funding Guidance](https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/:p:/t/ConnectedCustomerExperienceStrategy/EfcAEX7LETxDpzKXw_WAPQ8BIpMh8e2D_kb85imyLx4MHw?e=bupyN6&%3D&sdata=M3RHRHVvemxtUUFaSWxuOFYrWlJqdHN5ZVExS1FXUy9aWndGd2wzNDdyMD0%3D&ovuser=72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47%2Cmsunda%40microsoft.com&OR=Teams-HL&CT=1677533467606&clickparams=eyJBcHBOYW1lIjoiVGVhbXMtRGVza3RvcCIsIkFwcFZlcnNpb24iOiIyNy8yMzAyMDUwMTQwMyIsIkhhc0ZlZGVyYXRlZFVzZXIiOmZhbHNlfQ%3D%3D)
